External Code Libraries and Web Services

You can also use package managers to explore more code libraries. Popular ones include Composer for PHP, Sparks for Codeigniter, Bower for Javascript.

PHP

  • PDO
  • PHPUnit
  • Mockery
  • Behat and Mink
  • Ratchet
  • React
  • PHPSerial
  • Guzzle
  • Codeigniter Oauth
  • Codeigniter Oauth2

Javascript

  • jQuery
  • OpenLayers
  • D3
  • Raphael
  • Processing
  • Three
  • Coffeescript
  • Jasmine
  • JWPlayer
  • Datatables
  • LiquidSlider
  • Impress and Jmpress
  • Fittext
  • Markitup
  • Geshi
  • JSAR Toolkit
  • Fine Uploader
  • jQuery File Upload
  • Plupload
  • MathJax
  • tQuery
  • BtAppJS
  • MathBoxJS
  • Emscripten

Game Development

  • CreateJS
  • Box2DWeb

Web Services

  • TokBox
  • Mailchimp
  • Github
  • Google Maps
  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Pusher
  • Filepicker
  • Amazon S3 Storage
  • Wolfram Alpha
  • MongoHQ
  • MongoLab
  • Cloudant
  • Firebase
  • Gravatar
  • ReadSpeaker
  • Twilio
  • Bitly
  • Disqus
